Company Overview.Name: Ram Ratna Wires Ltd
Company Overview.Business Description: engaged in the manufacturing of winding wires, mainly enamelled copper wires.
Company Overview.Market Position: 2nd largest manufacturer of Winding Wire in South Asia. It is the only manufacturer of enameled copper wires in India, that offers the widest range from the thinnest wire of 18 microns (0.018mm) to 4.876 mm with intermediate sizes.
